players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Alice and Charlie are both suspects."
You: "I'm innocent and I believe Diana is the mafioso. Charlie, can you confirm if you saw anything suspicious last night?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
